MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA7 postcode area of Ayr. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5.10pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a confirmed underground cable fault in Upper Crofts and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:35PM on Friday 26 February 2021.
